Package com.intellij.openapi.vcs

Interface EditFileProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CvsVcs2, SvnEditFileProvider

    public interface EditFileProvider
    VCS interface for invoking "check out"/"edit file" operations.
    See Also:
    AbstractVcs.getEditFileProvider()

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void editFiles(VirtualFile[] files)
      Initiates the edit / checkout operation for the specified files.
      java.lang.String getRequestText()
      Returns the text shown to the user to confirm the check out / edit file operation.

    • Method Detail

      • editFiles

        void editFiles(VirtualFile[] files)
        throws VcsException
        Initiates the edit / checkout operation for the specified files.
        Parameters:
        files - the list of files to edit or check out.
        Throws:
        VcsException - if the operation fails for some reason.

      • getRequestText

        java.lang.String getRequestText()
        Returns the text shown to the user to confirm the check out / edit file operation.
        Returns:
        the operation confirmation text.
